item.title: Close the world, open the next.
item.author: Masahito Zembutsu
item.description:
Hello!

I'm @zembutsu. My work is a technical evangelist of a certain company. I worked as an operation engineer and sysadmin till then for ten several years. It is operation and monitoring, and my specialty wrestles for automation recently.

I intend to write that I am interested in technology in this blog.
